g.text: Acknowledgments:
We gratefully acknowledge J. Wu for the XPS measurement. M.Y.
acknowledges the support from IMPRS-RECHARGE. We thank the High-Performance
Computing (HPC) Platform of ShanghaiTech University for computation time.
Funding:
This work was financially supported by the European Research Council (ERC Advanced
Grant No. 291472 “Idea Heusler”) and ERC Advanced Grant (no. 742068) “TOPMAT”. M.E.K.
acknowledges the Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research (NWO) (no. 022.005.006).
E.L. acknowledges the National Key R&D Program of China (no. 2017YFA0206303) and
the National Natural Science Foundation of China (no. 51722106).
Author contributions:
C.Fe. conceived the original idea and supervised the project. G.L. conceived and designed the
catalytic experiments. E.L. performed the single-crystal growth and magnetic and electric
resistivity measurements with the help of V.S. M.E.K. contributed the single-crystal XRD.
L.J. and S.W. performed the STM measurement. R.S., A.K.S., and S.P. carried out the TEM
measurement. Q.X., W.S., Y.S., and E.L. contributed the theoretical calculation. E.L,, C.Fu, N.K.,
M.Y., H.T., J.G., and G.A. helped on the data analysis. G.L. wrote the manuscript. All authors
discussed the results and commented on the manuscript.
Competing interests:
The authors
declare that they have no competing interests.
Data and materials availability:
All data needed
to evaluate the conclusions in the paper are present in the paper and/or the Supplementary
Materials. Additional data related to this paper may be requested from the authors.
Submitted 13 February 2019
Accepted 10 July 2019
Published 16 August 2019
10.1126/sciadv.aaw9867
Citation:
G. Li, Q. Xu, W. Shi, C. Fu, L. Jiao, M. E. Kamminga, M. Yu, H. Tüysüz, N. Kumar, V. Süß,
R. Saha, A. K. Srivastava, S. Wirth, G. Auffermann, J. Gooth, S. Parkin, Y. Sun, E. Liu, C. Felser,
Surface states in bulk single crystal of topological semimetal Co
Sn
S
toward water oxidation.
Sci. Adv.
S CI E NCE ADVANCE S
RE S E ARCH ART I CL E
Li
et al
Sci. Adv.
: eaaw9867 16 August 2019
8 of 8
